snippet: The move gives a powerful boost to the group known as the National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces. On Tuesday, France also fully embraced the group.
abstract: Turkey officially recognizes National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces as legitimate leader of Syrian people, important step in group’s effort to attract legitimacy and, it hopes, more weapons to bring about end of Pres Bashar al-Assad’s rule; announcement is third significant recognition of group in week.

byline.original: By SEBNEM ARSU and TIM ARANGO

lead_paragraph: The move gives a powerful boost to the group known as the National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces. On Tuesday, France also fully embraced the group.

headline.seo: Turkey Recognizes Rebel Group as Head of Syria
headline.main: Turks Grant Recognition to Coalition of Syrians
headline.print_headline: Turks Grant Recognition To Coalition Of Syrians

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces
